title: From Gucci Wallets to Altuzarra Sweaters, Enjoy $250 on Your Next Luxury Purchase
description: ELLE’s exclusive promo code is inside.
excerpt: ELLE’s exclusive promo code is inside.
text: I’ve got good news for all of the luxury lovers out there. ELLE just secured a discount code that will take $250 off of your next purchase of $500 or more. I know Halloween is right around the corner, but I can assure you your mind is not playing tricks on you, and there’s no hocus pocus happening here. The exclusive offer comes courtesy of Amazon during its two-day fall shopping extravaganza (a.k.a. Amazon Prime Big Deals Days). As the giant e-tailer expands its offering into the luxury space, it has formed direct partnerships with need-to-know designers—like Altuzarra, Sergio Hudson, and Rodarte (yes, the same brand behind Kendall Jenner’s prettiest dresses). Plus, there’s a curated collection of pre-loved bags and jewelry that have been inspected by experts and are ready to find a new home.All Prime members have to do is add at least $500 worth of items into your cart, enter the code ELLEPD250, and watch the prices drop. I live by the motto of buying better, not more. And this is the moment to add expertly crafted pieces to your closet for a fraction of the price. Here’s the exact place to find all of the eligible products. And if you’re looking for a shopping cheat code, discover some of our favorite finds to add to your cart below. Altuzarra Soleil SweaterUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Sergio Hudson Signature PantNow 50% OffUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Gucci Pre-Loved Card HolderUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Bottega Veneta SunglassesUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Rodarte Lace Puff Sleeve DressUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Giuseppe Zanotti Enriette BootsUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Sergio Hudson Leopard Trench CoatNow 50% OffUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Eudon Choi Margaret TopUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Prada Pre-Loved Saffiano ToteUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Maygel Coronel Yeimis One PieceUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Sensi Studio Lamp Shade Crochet HatUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.PatBO Lace Beach SkirtNow 34% OffUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Dior Pre-Loved Book ToteUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Maygel Coronel Cenit BodydressUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.Giuseppe Zanotti Flamina Square SandalsUse ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more. Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
html:
I’ve got good news for all of the luxury lovers out there. ELLE just secured a discount code that will take $250 off of your next purchase of $500 or more. I know Halloween is right around the corner, but I can assure you your mind is not playing tricks on you, and there’s no hocus pocus happening here.

The exclusive offer comes courtesy of Amazon during its two-day fall shopping extravaganza (a.k.a. Amazon Prime Big Deals Days). As the giant e-tailer expands its offering into the luxury space, it has formed direct partnerships with need-to-know designers—like Altuzarra, Sergio Hudson, and Rodarte (yes, the same brand behind Kendall Jenner’s prettiest dresses). Plus, there’s a curated collection of pre-loved bags and jewelry that have been inspected by experts and are ready to find a new home.

All Prime members have to do is add at least $500 worth of items into your cart, enter the code ELLEPD250, and watch the prices drop. I live by the motto of buying better, not more. And this is the moment to add expertly crafted pieces to your closet for a fraction of the price. Here’s the exact place to find all of the eligible products. And if you’re looking for a shopping cheat code, discover some of our favorite finds to add to your cart below.

Altuzarra Soleil Sweater

Use ELLEPD250 for $250 off of purchases of $500 or more.

Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
